name: PROBLEM
description: This table contains data on care integrator problems associated with a patient.

columns.name: PROBLEM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the care integrator problem.

columns.name: TYPE_PROBLEM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the multidisciplinary diagnosis associated with this problem.

columns.name: CREATED_DATE
columns.description: The date the problem was added to the patient's care plan.

columns.name: DELETED_DATE
columns.description: The date the problem was removed from the patient's care plan.

columns.name: DEL_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason a problem was removed.

columns.name: DISCIPLINE_C_NAME
columns.description: The discipline associated with this problem.

columns.name: IP_DISC_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the discipline associated with this problem.

columns.name: IP_DISC_TYPE_ID_DISC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the discipline record.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: This column shows the record's display name.

columns.name: PROBLEM_DESCRIPTION_HNO_ID
columns.description: The linked note record for the care plan problem description. This column is frequently used to link to the HNO_INFO table.

columns.name: HH_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The associated episode ID for a care plan problem.

columns.name: CHILD_LAST_ADDED_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when a goal or intervention was last added to the problem.
